elements.name: arcgis-chart
elements.description:
The ArcGIS Chart component renders various chart types based on the provided model.

Supported chart types include bar charts, line charts, pie charts, box plots, combo bar-line charts, gauges, scatterplots, histograms and radar charts.

The Chart component can be rendered using an [existing model](https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/latest/charts-components-intro/#use-an-existing-model-from-a-webmap-or-feature-layer) from a web map or feature layer,
or by [creating a new model](https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/latest/charts-components-intro/#create-a-new-model).

See also:
- [Introduction to Charts components](https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/latest/charts-components-intro/)
- [Tutorial: Display and create charts components](https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/latest/tutorials/display-and-create-charts-components/)
--

### Events
- **arcgisAxesMinMaxChange** - Event triggered once the chart axes min/max values are computed
- **arcgisBadDataWarningRaise** - Event triggered when an error is detected with the data set
- **arcgisConfigChange** - Event triggered when the chart config is changed
- **arcgisDataFetchComplete** - Event triggered once the chart data has been fetched but not yet fully processed.
For instance it can be useful for a pie chart to see all the slices before they get grouped into an 'other' slice during the post-processing step.
- **arcgisDataProcessComplete** - Event triggered once the chart data has been processed
- **arcgisDataProcessError** - Event triggered when an error occurred while fetching of processing the data for the chart
- **arcgisLegendItemVisibilityChange** - Event triggered once a legend item visibility has been changed
- **arcgisNoRenderPropChange** - Event triggered when a no-render prop is changed
- **arcgisRuntimeError** - Event triggered when an error occurred that prevents the chart from being created or updated
- **arcgisSelectionComplete** - Event triggered when a selection is applied to the chart
- **arcgisSeriesColorChange** - Event triggered once the chart series color have been assigned
- **arcgisSeriesOrder** - Event carrying the series id as they have been sorted following the `orderOptions` instructions
- **arcgisUpdateComplete** - Event triggered once the chart is updated

### Methods
- `clearSelection(): Promise<void>` - Clears all selection on the chart.
- `componentOnReady(): Promise<void>` - Create a promise that resolves once component is fully loaded.
- `errorAlert(errorMessage?: string): Promise<void>` - Triggers an alert to display an error message.
- `exportAsCSV(options?: CSVOptions): Promise<void>` - Export the current chart's data as a CSV file.
- `exportAsImage(format?: DownloadableChartImagesTypes): Promise<void>` - Export the current chart as an image.
- `notify(message?: string, heading?: string, options?: NotifyOptions): Promise<void>` - Notify method allows passing external messages to the chart component.
It can be used to pass validation or information messages.
In a situation where a config update is overriding your notification modal,
consider waiting for the `arcgisUpdateComplete` event.
- `refresh(props?: { updateData?: boolean; resetAxesBounds?: boolean; updateExtent?: boolean; }): Promise<void>` - Re-render the chart.
- `resetZoom(): Promise<void>` - Resets the chart zoom to bring it back to full extent
- `switchSelection(): Promise<void>` - Switches the selection on the chart.

### Slots
- **action-bar** - Slot for adding a `charts-action-bar` component or `calcite-action-bar`.

attributes.name: action-mode
attributes.description:
Not applicable to gauge.
Defines the cursor behavior on the chart (zoom, selection...).

attributes.name: auto-dispose-chart
attributes.description: Auto-disposes the chart when a new one is created in the same container.

attributes.name: component-version
attributes.description: Whether to use the stable version of the component or the beta version.

attributes.name: cursor-range
attributes.description:
Sets the cursor range:
- CursorRange.MultiAxes: allows to draw a free rectangle
- CursorRange.XAxis: allows to draw a rectangle bound to the x-axis
- CursorRange.YAxis: allows to draw a rectangle bound to the y-axis
- undefined: defaults to a preset behavior according to the chart type and action mode

attributes.name: disable-interactions
attributes.description: Disables all interactions on the chart.

attributes.name: disable-toggling-legend-items
attributes.description: Disables the toggling of series via the legend items.

attributes.name: enable-configuration
attributes.description: Whether to use features uniquely designed for a chart currently being configured by a user via the UI.

attributes.name: enable-responsive-features
attributes.description: Enables the responsive features.

attributes.name: error-policy
attributes.description: Whether to display an error alert and hide the chart when it can't be created or updated.

attributes.name: feature-index
attributes.description:
The index of the feature to be rendered.
Only used when the gauge is a feature-based gauge.

attributes.name: filter-by-extent
attributes.description: When `true`, all chart elements are filtered based on view extent.

attributes.name: filter-by-selection
attributes.description: When `true`, all chart elements are filtered based on selection.

attributes.name: hide-empty-series
attributes.description:
When `true`, the empty series are completely hidden from the chart and the legend.
For example a series can be empty after applying a data filter, filter by attribute or geometry (as when using the filter by extent).

attributes.name: hide-license-watermark
attributes.description: Hides the license watermark.

attributes.name: hide-loader-animation
attributes.description: Hides the loader animation (curtain and spinner), showed by default at every update.

attributes.name: ignore-smooth-rendering-limit
attributes.description:
When `true`, disables the default setting that uses debounce functions to handle the visibility of markers
that are outside of the plotting area when the min/max bound changes and/or when a zoom action is performed
(via chart cursor or scrollbar), to increase performance.
This property will be set when the chart is created and cannot be updated after that.
It's recommended that this property should only be set to true for small datasets.
When left `undefined`, will be treated as `false`.

attributes.name: ignore-view-extent
attributes.description:
This property will be effective when the component's `view` is provided or when the `layer` is set to a FeatureLayerView.
By default the queries made by the chart will consider the view's extent as the unique geometry filter applicable. This implies ignoring any
geometry passed through the config (component.config.dataFilters) or the runtime filters (component.runtimeDataFilters).
Setting this property to `false` signals the queries to ignore the view's extent, whether an additional geometry filter is provided or not.

attributes.name: layer-fields-change-policy
attributes.description:
Allows the chart to update automatically when the layer's fields change.
Applies when the field list (`fields`) in the feature layer is updated.

attributes.name: layer-filter-change-policy
attributes.description: Whether the chart should be refreshed when the layer's filter (`definitionExpression`) changes.

attributes.name: layer-renderer-change-policy
attributes.description:
Allows the chart to update automatically when the layer's renderer changes.
Applies when the color match feature is enabled.

attributes.name: legend-position
attributes.description: Used to set the legend's position on the chart.

attributes.name: legend-visibility
attributes.description: When `true`, the legend is visible on the chart.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: A placeholder string to provides a brief hint to the user indicating needed information for creating a chart.

attributes.name: queue-chart-creation
attributes.description: Builds the charts one by one rather than all at the same time.

attributes.name: replace-no-value-category-with-zero
attributes.description:
When `true`, the chart's dataItems associated with empty (no value) categories (from only a `Count` aggregation)
will be populated with 0s, via the `completeDataForEmptyCategoriesWithZeros` method.

attributes.name: return-features-extent
attributes.description:
When `true`, the features extent will be returned through the `arcgisDataProcessComplete` and `arcgisSelectionComplete` events payload.
Applies only to:
- charts using an aggregation
- data source using a feature layer compatible with envelope aggregation
The extent (IExtent) is returned through a property called `arcgis_charts_features_extent`.

attributes.name: return-selection-indexes
attributes.description: When `true`, the selection indexes will be computed whenever a selection is made on or passed to the chart.

attributes.name: return-selection-oi-ds
attributes.description:
When `true`, the object ids will be computed whenever a selection is made on or passed to the chart.
Only considered for a data source using a feature layer.

attributes.name: rotation
attributes.description:
Applicable to bar chart, line chart, combo bar-line and box plot.
When `true`, the chart is rotated 90 degrees so that the x-axis becomes vertical and the y-axis becomes horizontal.

attributes.name: set-time-binning-info-when-not-provided
attributes.description: When `true`, the series properties `unit` and `size` become optional and will be automatically set to values that fit the data set. Used when creating or updating a chart compatible with time binning.

attributes.name: sync-selection
attributes.description: Whether to synchronize the selection between chart components from the same layer.

attributes.name: sync-selections-between-chart-and-layer-view-policy
attributes.description: Determines whether the selections from the chart should be synchronized with the layer view and vice versa.

attributes.name: time-zone
attributes.description: Used to set a custom time zone for the chart.

attributes.name: use-animated-charts
attributes.description: Enables the animations on the chart.

attributes.name: use-popup-template-fields-info
attributes.description: Allows the use of the fields alias from the layer.popupTemplate when rendering the field names on the chart (e.g. tooltips, axes, legend).

attributes.name: view-time-extent-change-policy
attributes.description:
Whether the chart should be refreshed when the view's time extent changes.
This is not currently supported on histogram. Setting the property to "refresh" won't have any effect on that chart.

slots.name: action-bar
slots.description: Slot for adding a `charts-action-bar` component or `calcite-action-bar`.

events.name: arcgisAxesMinMaxChange
events.description: Event triggered once the chart axes min/max values are computed

events.name: arcgisBadDataWarningRaise
events.description: Event triggered when an error is detected with the data set

events.name: arcgisConfigChange
events.description: Event triggered when the chart config is changed

events.name: arcgisDataFetchComplete
events.description:
Event triggered once the chart data has been fetched but not yet fully processed.
For instance it can be useful for a pie chart to see all the slices before they get grouped into an 'other' slice during the post-processing step.

events.name: arcgisDataProcessComplete
events.description: Event triggered once the chart data has been processed

events.name: arcgisDataProcessError
events.description: Event triggered when an error occurred while fetching of processing the data for the chart

events.name: arcgisLegendItemVisibilityChange
events.description: Event triggered once a legend item visibility has been changed

events.name: arcgisNoRenderPropChange
events.description: Event triggered when a no-render prop is changed

events.name: arcgisRuntimeError
events.description: Event triggered when an error occurred that prevents the chart from being created or updated

events.name: arcgisSelectionComplete
events.description: Event triggered when a selection is applied to the chart

events.name: arcgisSeriesColorChange
events.description: Event triggered once the chart series color have been assigned

events.name: arcgisSeriesOrder
events.description: Event carrying the series id as they have been sorted following the `orderOptions` instructions

events.name: arcgisUpdateComplete
events.description: Event triggered once the chart is updated

properties.name: actionMode
properties.description:
Not applicable to gauge.
Defines the cursor behavior on the chart (zoom, selection...).

properties.name: autoDisposeChart
properties.description: Auto-disposes the chart when a new one is created in the same container.

properties.name: chartLimits
properties.description:
Used to customize the number maximum of bars allowed on the chart.
The chart's behavior once that limit is reached can be adjusted through the `behaviorAfterLimit` nested property, to either reject the creation
or update of the chart, or render the elements up to the given limits.

properties.name: chartWillRender
properties.description:
Lifecycle function executed after the data has been processed and before the chart renders.
Can be used to alter the config from information extracted from the data for instance.

properties.name: componentVersion
properties.description: Whether to use the stable version of the component or the beta version.

properties.name: cursorRange
properties.description:
Sets the cursor range:
- CursorRange.MultiAxes: allows to draw a free rectangle
- CursorRange.XAxis: allows to draw a rectangle bound to the x-axis
- CursorRange.YAxis: allows to draw a rectangle bound to the y-axis
- undefined: defaults to a preset behavior according to the chart type and action mode

properties.name: dataLabelFormatter
properties.description: A callback function used to format the data labels. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.
properties.type: (((category: string, value?: number | undefined, percent?: number | undefined, originalCategory?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string)) | (((count: number, binMinValue: number, binMaxValue: number) => string)) | (((statValue: number, percent?: number | undefined) => string)) | (((x: number, y: number, sizePolicyValue?: number | undefined) => string))

properties.name: disableInteractions
properties.description: Disables all interactions on the chart.

properties.name: disableTogglingLegendItems
properties.description: Disables the toggling of series via the legend items.

properties.name: enableConfiguration
properties.description: Whether to use features uniquely designed for a chart currently being configured by a user via the UI.

properties.name: enableResponsiveFeatures
properties.description: Enables the responsive features.

properties.name: errorPolicy
properties.description: Whether to display an error alert and hide the chart when it can't be created or updated.

properties.name: featureIndex
properties.description:
The index of the feature to be rendered.
Only used when the gauge is a feature-based gauge.

properties.name: filterByExtent
properties.description: When `true`, all chart elements are filtered based on view extent.

properties.name: filterBySelection
properties.description: When `true`, all chart elements are filtered based on selection.

properties.name: gaugeInnerLabelFormatter
properties.description:
A callback function used to format the gauge inner label. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be
interpreted as such.

properties.name: guideTooltipFormatter
properties.description: A callback function used to format the axes guides tooltip. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.

properties.name: hideEmptySeries
properties.description:
When `true`, the empty series are completely hidden from the chart and the legend.
For example a series can be empty after applying a data filter, filter by attribute or geometry (as when using the filter by extent).

properties.name: hideLicenseWatermark
properties.description: Hides the license watermark.

properties.name: hideLoaderAnimation
properties.description: Hides the loader animation (curtain and spinner), showed by default at every update.

properties.name: ignoreSmoothRenderingLimit
properties.description:
When `true`, disables the default setting that uses debounce functions to handle the visibility of markers
that are outside of the plotting area when the min/max bound changes and/or when a zoom action is performed
(via chart cursor or scrollbar), to increase performance.
This property will be set when the chart is created and cannot be updated after that.
It's recommended that this property should only be set to true for small datasets.
When left `undefined`, will be treated as `false`.

properties.name: ignoreViewExtent
properties.description:
This property will be effective when the component's `view` is provided or when the `layer` is set to a FeatureLayerView.
By default the queries made by the chart will consider the view's extent as the unique geometry filter applicable. This implies ignoring any
geometry passed through the config (component.config.dataFilters) or the runtime filters (component.runtimeDataFilters).
Setting this property to `false` signals the queries to ignore the view's extent, whether an additional geometry filter is provided or not.

properties.name: layer
properties.description:
Used to perform queries.
If the layer is a FeatureLayerView or if the layer and the `view` property are both provided, the queries will be executed client-side.

properties.name: layerFieldsChangePolicy
properties.description:
Allows the chart to update automatically when the layer's fields change.
Applies when the field list (`fields`) in the feature layer is updated.

properties.name: layerFilterChangePolicy
properties.description: Whether the chart should be refreshed when the layer's filter (`definitionExpression`) changes.

properties.name: layerRendererChangePolicy
properties.description:
Allows the chart to update automatically when the layer's renderer changes.
Applies when the color match feature is enabled.

properties.name: legendPosition
properties.description: Used to set the legend's position on the chart.

properties.name: legendValueLabelFormatter
properties.description:
A callback function used to format the legend value labels. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be
interpreted as such.
If provided, the formatter will be used if at least `WebChartPieChartLegend.displayNumericValue` or `WebChartPieChartLegend.displayPercentage` is true.
properties.type: (((value?: number | undefined, percent?: number | undefined) => string))

properties.name: legendVisibility
properties.description: When `true`, the legend is visible on the chart.

properties.name: loaderColors
properties.description: Defines the colors for the loader animation.

properties.name: messageOptions
properties.description: Used to set the options available to handle specific messages displayed by the chart.

properties.name: model
properties.description:
Instance of an ArcGIS Chart Model. Provides an API to interact with the chart's configuration.

**Note:** This property has a union type of `ChartModel | WebChart` meaning a raw chart config object can be passed to it instead, however it is recommended to use a `ChartModel` instance whenever possible.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: A placeholder string to provides a brief hint to the user indicating needed information for creating a chart.

properties.name: queueChartCreation
properties.description: Builds the charts one by one rather than all at the same time.

properties.name: replaceNoValueCategoryWithZero
properties.description:
When `true`, the chart's dataItems associated with empty (no value) categories (from only a `Count` aggregation)
will be populated with 0s, via the `completeDataForEmptyCategoriesWithZeros` method.

properties.name: returnFeaturesExtent
properties.description:
When `true`, the features extent will be returned through the `arcgisDataProcessComplete` and `arcgisSelectionComplete` events payload.
Applies only to:
- charts using an aggregation
- data source using a feature layer compatible with envelope aggregation
The extent (IExtent) is returned through a property called `arcgis_charts_features_extent`.

properties.name: returnSelectionIndexes
properties.description: When `true`, the selection indexes will be computed whenever a selection is made on or passed to the chart.

properties.name: returnSelectionOIDs
properties.description:
When `true`, the object ids will be computed whenever a selection is made on or passed to the chart.
Only considered for a data source using a feature layer.

properties.name: rotation
properties.description:
Applicable to bar chart, line chart, combo bar-line and box plot.
When `true`, the chart is rotated 90 degrees so that the x-axis becomes vertical and the y-axis becomes horizontal.

properties.name: runtimeDataFilters
properties.description: Applies runtime data filters to the chart's.

properties.name: secondaryYAxisLabelFormatter
properties.description:
A callback function used to format the secondary y-axis labels. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.
The property will be effective only if 3 axes are defined (dual axis chart).
properties.type: (((value: string | number | Date | null, originalValue?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string))

properties.name: selectionData
properties.description: When this property is set, it will apply a selection on the chart matching the provided selection.

properties.name: selectionTheme
properties.description:
Used to provide a customized theme for the selected and non selected elements.
If no style is provided for the selected elements, a default selection is applied.
If no style is provided for the non selected elements, the chart's style is applied.

properties.name: setTimeBinningInfoWhenNotProvided
properties.description: When `true`, the series properties `unit` and `size` become optional and will be automatically set to values that fit the data set. Used when creating or updating a chart compatible with time binning.

properties.name: syncSelection
properties.description: Whether to synchronize the selection between chart components from the same layer.

properties.name: syncSelectionsBetweenChartAndLayerViewPolicy
properties.description: Determines whether the selections from the chart should be synchronized with the layer view and vice versa.

properties.name: timeZone
properties.description: Used to set a custom time zone for the chart.

properties.name: tooltipFormatter
properties.description: A callback function used to format the tooltips. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.
properties.type: (((category: string, value?: number | undefined, percent?: number | undefined, originalCategory?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string)) | (((count: number, binMinValue: number, binMaxValue: number) => string)) | (((props: BarAndLineTooltipFormatCallbackProps) => string)) | (((props: BoxPlotTooltipFormatCallbackProps) => string)) | (((x: number, y: number, sizePolicyValue?: number | undefined) => string))

properties.name: updateSplitBySeries
properties.description:
Whether to update the series when the data updates while the chart uses a split-by field configuration.
If `addMissingSeries` is set to `true` the missing series will be added to cover the split-by values not referenced
by the config.
The default information from the property `updateSplitBySeries.seriesTemplate` will be applied to the new series.

properties.name: useAnimatedCharts
properties.description: Enables the animations on the chart.

properties.name: usePopupTemplateFieldsInfo
properties.description: Allows the use of the fields alias from the layer.popupTemplate when rendering the field names on the chart (e.g. tooltips, axes, legend).

properties.name: view
properties.description: Used to access the LayerView instance in order to perform client-side queries.

properties.name: viewTimeExtentChangePolicy
properties.description:
Whether the chart should be refreshed when the view's time extent changes.
This is not currently supported on histogram. Setting the property to "refresh" won't have any effect on that chart.

properties.name: xAxisLabelFormatter
properties.description:
Indicates whether to show the ArcGIS charts notify panel. False by default
A callback function used to format the x-axis labels. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.
properties.type: (((value: string | number | Date | null, originalValue?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string))

properties.name: yAxisLabelFormatter
properties.description: A callback function used to format the y-axis labels. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.
properties.type: (((value: string | number | Date | null, originalValue?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string))

events.description: Event triggered once the chart axes min/max values are computed

events.description: Event triggered when an error is detected with the data set

events.name: arcgisConfigChange
events.description: Event triggered when the chart config is changed

events.name: arcgisDataFetchComplete
events.description:
Event triggered once the chart data has been fetched but not yet fully processed.
For instance it can be useful for a pie chart to see all the slices before they get grouped into an 'other' slice during the post-processing step.

events.name: arcgisDataProcessComplete
events.description: Event triggered once the chart data has been processed

events.name: arcgisDataProcessError
events.description: Event triggered when an error occurred while fetching of processing the data for the chart

events.name: arcgisLegendItemVisibilityChange
events.description: Event triggered once a legend item visibility has been changed

events.name: arcgisNoRenderPropChange
events.description: Event triggered when a no-render prop is changed

events.name: arcgisRuntimeError
events.description: Event triggered when an error occurred that prevents the chart from being created or updated

events.name: arcgisSelectionComplete
events.description: Event triggered when a selection is applied to the chart

events.name: arcgisSeriesColorChange
events.description: Event triggered once the chart series color have been assigned

events.description: Event triggered once the chart is updated

elements.name: arcgis-charts-action-bar
elements.description:
The ArcGIS charts action bar component enhances chart functionality by offering context-specific actions such as rotation, zooming, and filtering.
It also supports general actions like exporting the chart as an image or CSV.
This component is designed to be used with a chart component and is not intended for standalone use.

See also:
- [Tutorial: Charts components with Map components using charts action bar](https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/latest/tutorials/charts-components-with-map-components/)
--

### Events
- **arcgisActionBarToggle** - Event triggered once action bar expand is toggled
- **arcgisDefaultActionSelect** - Event triggered once a default action is selected

### Methods
- `componentOnReady(): Promise<void>` - Create a promise that resolves once component is fully loaded.

### Slots
- **custom-action-top** - A slot for adding custom `calcite-action` to the top of the default actions.
- **custom-action-below** - A slot for adding custom `calcite-action` to the bottom of the default actions.

attributes.name: action-bar-selection-mode
attributes.description: Action bar selection mode. Defines which selection mode the slotted action bar should use.

attributes.name: chart-type
attributes.description: Chart type used to determine which default actions to display.

attributes.name: clear-selection-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the clear selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: clear-selection-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the clear selection action.

attributes.name: clear-selection-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the clear selection action is highlighted.

attributes.name: disabled-export-action
attributes.description: When `true`, the export action is disabled.

attributes.name: edit-chart-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the edit chart action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: edit-chart-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the edit chart action.

attributes.name: edit-chart-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the edit chart action is highlighted.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: When `true`, the action bar is expanded.

attributes.name: export-as-csv-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the download CSV is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: export-as-csv-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the download CSV action.

attributes.name: export-as-image-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the download image is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: export-as-image-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the download chart action.

attributes.name: filter-by-extent-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the filter by extent action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: filter-by-extent-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the filter by extent action.

attributes.name: filter-by-extent-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the filter by extent action is highlighted.

attributes.name: filter-by-selection-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the filter by selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: filter-by-selection-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the filter by selection action.

attributes.name: filter-by-selection-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the filter by selection action is highlighted.

attributes.name: force-disable-actions
attributes.description: When `true`, overrides the individual settings for each action to instead force disable them all.

attributes.name: full-extent-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the full extent action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: full-extent-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the full extent action.

attributes.name: full-extent-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the full extent action is highlighted.

attributes.name: legend-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the legend action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: legend-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the legend action.

attributes.name: legend-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the legend action is highlighted.

attributes.name: rotate-chart-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the rotate chart action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: rotate-chart-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the rotate chart action.

attributes.name: rotate-chart-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the rotate chart action is highlighted.

attributes.name: selection-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: selection-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the selection action.

attributes.name: selection-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the selection action is highlighted.

attributes.name: switch-selection-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the switch selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: switch-selection-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the switch selection action.

attributes.name: switch-selection-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the switch selection action is highlighted.

attributes.name: zoom-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the zoom action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: zoom-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the zoom action.

attributes.name: zoom-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the zoom action is highlighted.

slots.name: custom-action-top
slots.description: A slot for adding custom `calcite-action` to the top of the default actions.

slots.name: custom-action-below
slots.description: A slot for adding custom `calcite-action` to the bottom of the default actions.

events.name: arcgisActionBarToggle
events.description: Event triggered once action bar expand is toggled

events.name: arcgisDefaultActionSelect
events.description: Event triggered once a default action is selected

properties.name: actionBarSelectionMode
properties.description: Action bar selection mode. Defines which selection mode the slotted action bar should use.

properties.name: chartElement
properties.description: Chart element reference with which the action bar is associated.

properties.name: chartType
properties.description: Chart type used to determine which default actions to display.

properties.name: clearSelectionState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the clear selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: clearSelectionTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the clear selection action.

properties.name: clearSelectionToggle
properties.description: When active, the clear selection action is highlighted.

properties.name: disableCSVExportForChartTypes
properties.description:
The CSV export action is disabled for certain chart types.

Modify this property to add or remove chart types from the list of disabled types.

properties.name: disabledExportAction
properties.description: When `true`, the export action is disabled.

properties.name: editChartState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the edit chart action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: editChartTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the edit chart action.

properties.name: editChartToggle
properties.description: When active, the edit chart action is highlighted.

properties.name: expanded
properties.description: When `true`, the action bar is expanded.

properties.name: exportAsCSVState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the download CSV is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: exportAsCSVTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the download CSV action.

properties.name: exportAsImageState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the download image is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: exportAsImageTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the download chart action.

properties.name: filterByExtentState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the filter by extent action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: filterByExtentTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the filter by extent action.

properties.name: filterByExtentToggle
properties.description: When active, the filter by extent action is highlighted.

properties.name: filterBySelectionState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the filter by selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: filterBySelectionTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the filter by selection action.

properties.name: filterBySelectionToggle
properties.description: When active, the filter by selection action is highlighted.

properties.name: forceDisableActions
properties.description: When `true`, overrides the individual settings for each action to instead force disable them all.

properties.name: fullExtentState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the full extent action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: fullExtentTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the full extent action.

properties.name: fullExtentToggle
properties.description: When active, the full extent action is highlighted.

properties.name: hiddenActions
properties.description:
Holds a list of actions to hide from the action bar.

**Note:** The edit chart action is hidden by default. To show it, remove its value from this array.

properties.name: legendState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the legend action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: legendTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the legend action.

properties.name: legendToggle
properties.description: When active, the legend action is highlighted.

properties.name: messageOverrides
properties.description: Overwrite localized strings for this component

properties.name: rotateChartState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the rotate chart action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: rotateChartTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the rotate chart action.

properties.name: rotateChartToggle
properties.description: When active, the rotate chart action is highlighted.

properties.name: selectionState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: selectionTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the selection action.

properties.name: selectionToggle
properties.description: When active, the selection action is highlighted.

properties.name: switchSelectionState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the switch selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: switchSelectionTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the switch selection action.

properties.name: switchSelectionToggle
properties.description: When active, the switch selection action is highlighted.

properties.name: zoomState
properties.description: When disabled, interaction with the zoom action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

properties.name: zoomTitle
properties.description: Custom title for the zoom action.

properties.name: zoomToggle
properties.description: When active, the zoom action is highlighted.

events.name: arcgisActionBarToggle
events.description: Event triggered once action bar expand is toggled

events.name: arcgisDefaultActionSelect
events.description: Event triggered once a default action is selected
